description:
Bananya and Baby Sweet reach a wasteland where dry grasses tumble across the ground. As they`re looking around, they suddenly find themselves surrounded by a bunch of Rowdy Bananyas. Then our very own Western Bananya shows up, and the desert showdown begins. Who will stand victorious?!
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Rowdy Ruffians Race Across the Wastes, Nya!
こうやをかけるあらくれ, にゃ!
